EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Spring Integration 4.0 - The New Frontier 7AM.Confirmation 1
EmailTemplate.subject: Spring Webinars: Spring Integration 4.0 - The New Frontier
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Spring Integration 4.0 - The New Frontier with Gary Russell. We are looking forward to having you join us. To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details:
Date: Tuesday, May 13, 2014 Europe: 3:00pm BST (London, UTC+1) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=664572731> Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195292&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions
Access code: 664 572 731 Thank you,
